casebody.data:
Wimmer Family Trust, Appellant, v. FirstEnergy Corporation; Ohio Edison Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Wimmer Family Trust v. FirstEnergy Corp., 123 Ohio St.3d 144, 2009-Ohio-4304.]

(No. 2009-0249 Submitted July 14, 2009 Decided September 1, 2009.) Lester S. Potash, for appellant. Roetzel & Andress, L.P.A., Donald S. Scherzer, and John J. Schriner, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is vacated on the authority of Corrigan v. Illum. Co., 122 Ohio St.3d 265, 2009-Ohio-2524, 910 N.E.2d 1009, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for a final declaration of the metes and bounds of the easement.

Moyer, C.J., and Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Pfeifer and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent.
